blogs.title: Understanding React Hooks
blogs.author: Jane Doe
blogs.content: In this blog post, we will explore the basics of React Hooks including useState and useEffect. These features allow you to use state and lifecycle methods in functional components.

blogs.title: Styling with Tailwind CSS
blogs.author: John Smith
blogs.content: Tailwind CSS provides utility-first classes to build custom designs directly in your markup. Learn how to get started with Tailwind and improve your development workflow.
